backgrounds.name: Mechanical Engineer
backgrounds.desc: Language of pistons. You believe anything can be fixed with percussive maintenance and a wrench.

backgrounds.name: Computer Engineer
backgrounds.desc: OSINT Wizard. You see the world as data streams and backdoors. You prefer terminals to people.

backgrounds.name: The Architect
backgrounds.desc: Structure and Beauty. You judge civilizations by their load-bearing walls and aesthetics.

backgrounds.name: The Doctor
backgrounds.desc: Healer of biological hardware. You have steady hands, steel nerves, and zero patience for stupidity.

backgrounds.name: The Historian
backgrounds.desc: Time is your library. You know who died, when they died, and why their hat was fashionable.

backgrounds.name: The Artist
backgrounds.desc: You see colors others ignore. You are here to capture the soul of the timeline, not just the facts.

backgrounds.name: The Popstar
backgrounds.desc: Charisma weaponized. You can charm a king, distract a guard, or start a riot with a microphone.

backgrounds.name: The Actor
backgrounds.desc: Master of disguise. You don't just visit history; you blend in. The timeline is your stage.

backgrounds.name: The Athlete
backgrounds.desc: Peak physical condition. You run toward explosions while others run away. Stamina is your superpower.

backgrounds.name: The Adventurer
backgrounds.desc: Jack of all trades. You have a map in your head, a multitool in your pocket, and questionable survival instincts.

backgrounds.name: The Sailor
backgrounds.desc: Navigator of stars and seas. You know that the ocean is the only thing scarier than time itself.
